channel.title: Rs2 Vs Rsc
channel.description:
Iv recently been trolling some rs2 servers i just say dam cant believe there 300-500 people on one server and there are alot out there witch have 100-300 thats alot of rs2 fucks. I mean i get it its fun i played rs2 for years untill few months ago after the hp update thing was just gay only thing to say is jagex is taking over. Lol
Iv also been trolling rsc server meaning 1 or 2 emulation and dark-quest don't remember any other. Emulation is a highly developed server its a good server but i just dislike luke, xent is cool KO9 also cool zilent is just awesome he helped me with few things dunno pyru so yeah. Anyways its good to see rsc best developers(IMO) all joined one server team emulation has what 200-300 daily? just not enough for rsc community. And dark-quest is another server thats nice i like peeter he is a cool guy most i seen was like 80 online i think i played for awhile still do and its fun. As long as RSCEmulation and dark-quest are alive theres no point in making a server because they have everything you need in a rsc server.
Witch do ya'll think will proceed in the next 2-3 years :D

item.title: Rs2 Vs Rsc
item.dc:creator: @KO9 KO9
item.description:
@KO9 wrote:

~Kyle:

Punctuation man, come on.

Who is this ‘Punctuation man’?

Or did you mean to type:

Punctuation, man… Come on.

You kind of have to make the effort to avoid grammatical anomalies, when commenting on the faults of others. (:

item.title: Rs2 Vs Rsc
item.dc:creator: @mapu mapu
item.description:
@mapu wrote:

These topics are getting out of hand…

RSC will win in this section because this is the RSC section full of people who love RSC and/or code RSC. They would be in the RS2 section and/or coding RS2 servers if they favoured RS2 (generally speaking).

Read full topic

item.title: Rs2 Vs Rsc
item.dc:creator: @bamboozola bamboozola
item.description:
@bamboozola wrote:

[quote=“Kryptix, post:3, topic:360881”][quote author=Motaro link=topic=457113.msg3346446#msg3346446 date=1284868409]
Kind of going out on a limb here but…

I’d bet you’d be successful if you advertised your RSC on RS2 boards.

Albeit it’s against the rules, it would get more attention than the RSC boards.
[/quote]
I’ve advertised a lot on Sythe, google, Mopar, etc. RS2 noobs just flame the graphics.

Oh and RSCEmulation will stay up as long as there’s 50+ players online, if there’s any less it’s pointless to be honest. It’s the players who decide how long it’s around for.[/quote]True,

Read full topic

item.title: Rs2 Vs Rsc
item.dc:creator: @Canownueazy Canownueazy
item.description:
@Canownueazy wrote:

The server I worked for “InnovationX” hit 1208 players and it was only out for 2 months.

item.title: Rs2 Vs Rsc
item.dc:creator: @all_day All Day
item.description:
@all_day wrote:

I wish I liked RS2 but the problem is, they give players 15m cash for voting once, everyone on there is a multi-billionaire, it’s just idiotic. If you launched a server with slow rates and hard to make cash it would be dead. They expect everything handed to them which has a life span of about 2 days… It’s a shame.

Kryptix you should play on a Rs2 server and look at how many 12 year olds threaten to DDoS 24/7. Ch3rry and most of us played on one that had like 800 players on it and he DDoSed it for one day at got like 3 people including him Admin etc. In my opinion they are quite fun but most of them don’t last long. The one we played is the one which Cody infected the client with his keylogger and hacked Me, miles and heaps of others on Emulation

Read full topic

item.title: Rs2 Vs Rsc
item.dc:creator: @bamboozola bamboozola
item.description:
@bamboozola wrote:

[quote=“Old Rsc Player, post:6, topic:360823”][quote]
As long as RSCEmulation and dark-quest are alive theres no point in making a server because they have everything you need in a rsc server.
[/quote]

No. I believe there should me more servers, more ideas, more of a challenge. I wish 2 servers went head to head and didnt ddos eachother, like a legit battle. But we know that will never happen[/quote][quote=“all day, post:7, topic:360823”]i did not read it cuz its lookded dum[/quote]louv yuo te sxey

Read full topic

rsc all the way

item.title: Rs2 Vs Rsc
item.dc:creator: @sw0o0sh sw0o0sh
item.description:
@sw0o0sh wrote:

Two entirely different games, despite being called RuneScape IMO. I’ve never enjoyed RS2, though I have tried it. I just don’t know, don’t like it. Some of the idea’s are nice, but it is just too different for my taste. As for the next 2 to 3 years, that’s a tough call. Private server death is often sudden and spontaneous, from what I’ve seen in the past few years myself of “lurking”. My bets are Pets will drop it entirely after about 8 months, and Luke will just set his modem on fire

Read full topic

item.title: Rs2 Vs Rsc
item.dc:creator: @Old_Rsc_Player Old Rsc Player
item.description:
@Old_Rsc_Player wrote:

As long as RSCEmulation and dark-quest are alive theres no point in making a server because they have everything you need in a rsc server.

No. I believe there should me more servers, more ideas, more of a challenge. I wish 2 servers went head to head and didnt ddos eachother, like a legit battle. But we know that will never happen

Read full topic

item.title: Rs2 Vs Rsc
item.dc:creator: @Motaro Motaro
item.description:
@Motaro wrote:

KO9:

trolling != lurking, I wish people would use the terms correctly… They are not synonymous.

To add…

Saying you troll doesn’t make you sound cool or whatever point he was trying to make.
